page.title: 14SCHOOL BUSES
page.content: At 7.45 I have to walk down the road for my daily trip to school in Okehampton. It is a 20 mile round trip. We get on as soon as our bus comes to the bridge where we wait. We travel to Monkokehampton to pick up some people. Then we go on to Exbourne, Dornaford and Okehampton. When the bus arrives at school, the 1st and 2nd year students get off at the lower school. The rest go on to the upper school. At 4.00 the bell goes for the end of school and we rush to our waiting bus. At 4.05 the bus departs from lower school and goes on to the upper school. At 4.10 the bus departs for home. All together there are 19 buses. People come from as far as 20 miles away. In the winter snow often stops the buses running and it is impossible to get to school.
